summary: drm/amdgpu: Off by one in dm_dmub_outbox1_low_irq()
details:
drm/amdgpu: Off by one in dm_dmub_outbox1_low_irq()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit b0808b7a04157b3f56e919f27023fec37a075fad, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit e27c41d5b0681c597ac1894f4e02cf626e062250. For more details please see the references link.
